thread.title: Here’s where you can watch the Galaxy S8 launch livestream
thread.title_full: Here’s where you can watch the Galaxy S8 launch livestream

author: Asif S.
title: Here’s where you can watch the Galaxy S8 launch livestream
text:
Asif S. / 56 mins ago 
Samsung will unveil its flagship smartphones for 2017, the Galaxy S8 and the Galaxy S8+ , later today. The devices would be unveiled at the company’s press conference at the David Geffen Hall, Lincoln Center in New York (11AM EDT) and at the Here East (2012 Olympic Press and Broadcast Centre) in London (4PM BST/ 5PM CET). If you want to watch the Galaxy S8 and S8+ launch livestream, there are quite a few places where you can watch it. 1. Watch via Samsung’s official websites 
You can visit news.samsung.com or www.samsung.com/galaxy to tune into the livestream. The livestream will begin on March 29 at 11 a.m. (EDT). 2. Watch via Samsung’s official Facebook Pages 
You can also catch the event live through Facebook by visiting facebook.com/SamsungMobile or facebook.com/SamsungElectronics when the event begins. 3. Watch via the UNPACKED 2017 mobile app 
If you’re not on desktop during the event, you can watch it on your compatible Android or iOS smartphone by downloading and installing the UNPACKED 2017 app (compatible with Android and iOS )
